DOCNAME: CASE OF PINE VALLEY DEVELOPMENTS LTD AND OTHERS v. IRELAND (ARTICLE 50)
CONCLUSION: Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The case was referred to the ORG by ORG ( " the Commission " ) and by the Government of GPE ( " the Government " ) on DATE and DATE , respectively . It originated in an application ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) against GPE lodged with the ORG in DATE by CARDINAL companies registered in that ORG , ORG ( " LOC " ) and ORG ( " Healy Holdings " ) , and an NORP national , Mr PERSON .

CARDINAL . By judgment of CARDINAL DATE ( " the principal judgment " ) , the ORG held , inter alia , that ORG and PERSON ( hereinafter together referred to as " the applicants " ) had been victims of discrimination contrary to LAW , taken in conjunction with LAW No . CARDINAL ( article CARDINAL+PCARDINAL - CARDINAL ) , in that section CARDINAL of ORG DATE ( " LAW " ) had retrospectively validated all planning permissions in the relevant category other than theirs ( Series A no . CARDINAL , paragraphs CARDINAL of the reasons and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL and CARDINAL ) .

The only outstanding matter to be settled is the question of the application of LAW ) . As regards the facts , reference should be made to paragraphs CARDINAL of the principal judgment ( ibid . , pp . CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . At the ORG ’s hearing on CARDINAL DATE , counsel for the ORG and ORG both reserved their position on the claims for just satisfaction advanced by the applicants .

In the principal judgment , the ORG therefore reserved the whole of this question and invited the ORG and the applicants to submit , within DATE , their written comments thereon and , in particular , to notify ORG of any agreement reached between them ( paragraphs CARDINAL of the reasons and point CARDINAL of the operative provisions , pp . CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . Following the failure of settlement negotiations and in accordance with the foregoing invitation and the President ’s directions , submissions and observations relating to the claims under LAW ) were filed by the applicants on DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE and DATE , by the Government on DATE , DATE and DATE and by ORG on DATE . The materials furnished to the ORG included valuations by chartered surveyors of the land owned by ORG , to which outline planning permission had initially been attached ( " the Clondalkin site " ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG decided that there was no need to hold a hearing .

CARDINAL . At the deliberations on DATE Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON , who had sat to consider the merits of the case but were unable to be present on that date , were replaced by PERSON , who sat as President of the ORG , and Mr PERSON , substitute judge , respectively ; PERSON in her turn was replaced by PERSON , also a substitute judge ( Rules CARDINAL para . CARDINAL , CARDINAL para . CARDINAL , CARDINAL para . CARDINAL and CARDINAL para . CARDINAL ) .
